DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures ARS profile.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure an ARS profile. User should specify profile name. Upon successful configuration CLI mode will be changed to config-ars-profile.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures ARS profile.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command unconfigure an ARS profile. User should specify profile name.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Displays current ARS profile configuration
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to display running configurations within current ARS profile.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config-ars-profile)# show configuration ! ars profile sampling-interval 10 port-load past-weight 10 port-load future-weight 10

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Bind ARS profile to switch.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to bind an ARS profile to switch. User should specify profile name.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unbind ARS profile from switch.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to unbind an ARS profile from switch. User should specify profile name.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures ARS Port Profile.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure an ARS port profile. User should specify the profile name. Upon successful configuration CLI mode will be changed to config-ars-port-profile.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigures ARS Port Profile.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to unconfigure an ARS port profile. User should specify port profile name.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Displays current ARS port-profile configuration
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to display running configurations within current ARS port-profile.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config-ars-port-profile)# show configuration ! ars port-profile load-scaling-factor 20

PARAM.help: Port load factor for internal calculation
Port load factor for port speed 10G
Port load factor for port speed 25G.
Port load factor for port speed 40G.
Port load factor for port speed 50G.
Port load factor for port speed 100G.
Port load factor for port speed 200G.
Port load factor for port speed 400G
Port load factor for port speed 800G

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures port load scaling factor value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure port load scaling factor value for ARS.

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures port load scaling factor value.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: UnConfigures port load scaling factor value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to Unconfigure port load scaling factor value for ARS.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Enable ARS for the port.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to enable ARS for the port.

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Disable ARS for the port.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable ARS for the port.

COMMAND.name: load-past-enable

COMMAND.name: load-future-enable
COMMAND.help: Enable future load quality measure in switch pipeline.

COMMAND.name: load-past-weight

COMMAND.name: show ars
COMMAND.help: Display Adaptive Routing and Switching Show commands

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display ARS profile.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars profile default ARS Profile Attributes Info:
Profile Name: default ARS algorithm used for quality computation: EWMA Sampling interval of data for quality measure computation: 16 microsecond(s) Random seed: 0 Past port load as the quality parameter: Enabled Past port load weight: 15 Future port load as the quality parameter: Enabled Future port load weight: 15 Current port load calculation: enabled Exponential port load value: 2 Minimum and Maximum threshold used for band 0 quantization: 0 and 0

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display ARS port profile.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars port-profile default Port Attributes Info:
Port Profile Name: default ARS for a port is: Disabled Port load scaling factor: 0 Port Past load is: Disabled Port Future load is: Disabled

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display ARS object.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars object default ARS Object Attributes Info:
ARS Object Name: default Idle duration to classify a flow-let in a macro flow: 16 microsecond(s) Maximum flow size: 1K bytes ARS path (re)assignment mode: Per flow-let quality based

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display ARS Binding Info.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars bind ARS Profile binding Info (Switch Name : Profile Name): SWITCH: profile1
Port Profile binding Info (Port Profile Name : Interfaces): pp1 : Ethernet32, Ethernet40 pp2 : Ethernet36
ARS Object binding Info (Routemap, Seq.No : Object Name): rmap1, 2 : object1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display NHG ARS Binding Info.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars nhg-statistics NHG Statistics Info:
NHG ID: 1 Number of packet drops: 0 Number of next hop reassignments: 0 Number of port reassignments: 0

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display ARS Port Quality Info.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic#show ars port-quality DLB Quality on egress ports:
PortName Quality [0-7] ------------------------ Eth4 7 Eth2 7 Eth3 5

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clear ARS NHG Statistics.
